mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat (from_user_id, to_user_id, product_id, help_id, content, is_read, create_time) VALUES (#{fromUserId}, #{toUserId}, #{productId}, #{helpId}, #{content}, #{isRead}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM chat WHERE (from_user_id = #{userId1} AND to_user_id = #{userId2}) OR (from_user_id = #{userId2} AND to_user_id = #{userId1}) ORDER BY create_time ASC
SELECT * FROM chat WHERE to_user_id = #{userId} AND is_read = 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE chat SET is_read = #{isRead} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE chat SET is_read = 1 WHERE from_user_id = #{fromUserId} AND to_user_id = #{toUserId} AND is_read = 0
